markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Hydraulic Torrent](/Spells.aspx?ID=155)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 344 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Hei Feng](/Deities.aspx?ID=40), [Jin Li](/Deities.aspx?ID=264), [Kelizandri](/Deities.aspx?ID=104)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot line

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering creatures and unattended objects in its path and possibly pushing them away from you. The torrent deals 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save; unattended objects automatically fail. Creatures and objects that fail the save are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure).

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Hydraulic Torrent

summary: Force creatures back with a damaging line of water.
summary_markdown: Force creatures back with a damaging line of water.
text: Hydraulic Torrent Source Core Rulebook pg. 344 4.0 Tradition Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Hei Feng, Jin Li, Kelizandri Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 60-foot line Saving Throw Fortitude --- A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering creatures and unattended objects in its path and possibly pushing them away from you. The torrent deals 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save; unattended objects automatically fail. Creatures and objects that fail the save are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure). --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
